reference.title: Teams Whiteboard Features
reference.shortdesc: Whiteboard has a multitude of features for use in a Teams meeting on desktop or in the app version.

strow.stentry: Allow allow participants to follow your point of view during a meeting.
Add a text box to the whiteboard. Text color can be changed but the font cannot be changed.
Add a sticky note to the whiteboard. Choose the note color and type in the sticky note's text box.
Digital ink with 15 colors, 15 highlighters, ink arrows, and various thicknesses. Draw also contains the Laser Pointer tool for temporarily hihglighting areas of the board.
Used to draw straight lines on the whiteboard canvas.
Changes hand-drawn shapes to precise shapes automatically. Toggle off or on in Settings.
Eight reactions, such as thumbs up, heart, check box, or smiley face.
Template with whiteboard elements arranged for collaboration and planning. Includes templates designed for brainstorming, retrospectives, workshops, and other uses.
